prompt.task: Evaluate the risk and compliance factors in the provided Statement of Work (SoW).
prompt.instructions: 1. Identify potential risks and compliance gaps. 2. Verify adherence to security, regulatory, and industry standards. 3. Check for proper handling of sensitive data and privacy measures.
prompt.output: Compliance Validation: [Compliant/Non-Compliant] Identified Risks: [List of risks] Missing Compliance Measures: [List of missing measures] Recommendations: [Suggested fixes]
